StartDate.description: Start date of the reference period. The format must complies with the RFC 3339 standard. E.g.:2020-12-31T23:59:59.00Z (full-dateTfull-timeZ)

EndDate.description: End date of the reference period. The format must complies with the RFC 3339 standard. E.g.:2020-12-31T23:59:59.00Z (full-dateTfull-timeZ)
